subject: [Radiance-general] HELP Atmosphere, creating hdr and luminance fotos
body:
Hi,

I am making hdr and want to have luminace fotos as well. I dont have a MAC,
and using the one of somebody else. Is there another program or way to
install atmosphere on a windows? I saw some stuff on the internet of
running mac on a windows but wanted to know if there is a solution that is
easier!

Greetings Jasper
